Note: Signed "J.P. Beadle." "Poster No. 36" appears on the bottom left on the poster. "(2264) WT.17694/2705. 7-8-18. J.R.&C." appears on the bottom right. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to buy war savings certificates because it's worthwhile. Illustration shows two men talking to each other.  One man is smoking a pipe and the other man is holding a slice of bread. l
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: It's worth while!
